Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People are buzzing about the Reserve Bank of Australia! A sweeping review has questioned its decisions recommended a new expert-driven monetary policy board and suggested governance and transparency updates. Treasurer Jim Chalmers broadly accepted all 51 recommendations and emphasized the importance of avoiding any politicisation of the bank. Although details have yet to emerge the changes aim to future-proof the bank enabling improved economic and monetary policy management.
